data.title: Wally Wanderoon and His Story Telling Machine by Joel Chandler Harris: GOOD HARDCOVER (1904) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - HARDCOVER - Alexander Moring Ltd - 1904 - Condition: GOOD - 1904. Alexander Moring Ltd. Hardback. GOOD First edition, illustrated cover, internally and externally good, pages clean, black and white illustrations, tanning to page edges, cover faded, spine faded, spine cracked, shelf wear, edgeworn, 8.5' x 6.5' - Wally Wanderoon and His Story Telling Machine
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Terms of Sale: Payment accepted direct by Sterling cheques or money orders. We

also accept credit or debit cards, Amex and PayPal, or through ABE payments.

Books may be returned to us for any reason within 30 days. Return postage will

also be refunded if the book is not as described.

Payment Methods

Sterling cheques

Sterling Money orders

MasterCard

Visa

PayPal

Amex

Shipping Terms:

Shipping Terms: We aim to have all orders shipped the same day or next business day.

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 lbs or 1 kg. If your book order is heavy or oversized we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
